title: Proposal to Update Game Module's deposit_denom Parameter to $COHO
description:
The Qwoyn Network is proposing an update to the Game Module's deposit_denom parameter, changing it to $COHO to align with the implementation of the internal LP functionality. This update aims to bring consistency, simplify operations, and enhance the utility of $COHO within the network. The community is encouraged to review the proposal, provide feedback, and actively participate in shaping the future of decentralized gaming on the Qwoyn Network.

**Voting:** A yes vote will update the deposit_denom to $COHO.

For more information please visit the Qwoyn Network Governance Forum - https://commonwealth.im/qwoyn-network/discussion/12042-proposal-to-update-game-modules-deposit_denom-parameter-to-coho
